A6020.changelog:
- Blacklisted google hotword service to fix mic issues
- Enabled audiosphere effect by default
- Fixed FM radio
- Fixed postprocessing daemon crashes
- Misc changes for infra

X01AD.changelog:
- May 2021 Security Patch.
- Tune vibration Pattern.
- Miscellaneous fixes.

alioth.changelog:
- Fix vulkan driver (fixed crash apps, which use it)
- Fix set media profiles (fixed 1080p video for front camera)
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.

Kernel:
- Merge CAF tag LA.UM.9.12.r1-11500-SMxx50.0
- Cleanup Xiaomi code
- Add SDFAT driver
- Many fixes and improve changes.

Installation instruction: https://forum.xda-developers.com/t/rom-11-0-0-alioth-aliothin-arrowos-11-0-official-weekly.4279481/post-85045261

apollo.changelog:
- test with lineage kernel
- fix echo on VoIP speaker calls
- test sepolicy wakeup labelling
- fixup some selinux policy
- deep sleep (smp2p) fixed

beryllium.changelog:
- Switch pixel libperfmgr power HAL
- Sepolicy: Fixes and address denials
- Build disabled VBMeta image
- Switch to brightness float values
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.

Kernel:
- Merge last linux version tag
- Merge CAF tag msm-4.9 LA.UM.9.3.r1-02100-sdm845.0 and wlan LA.UM.8.3.c25-01900-sdm845.0
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.

Note:
- Update 2021-01-01 and earlier builds only with clean flash!

cas.changelog:
1. Update blobs to 21.3.24
2. Switch to oss kernel

cheeseburger.changelog:
- Upstream changes
- Fixed camera access for FaceUnlock

cmi.changelog:
! ! ! Firmware and vendor require update to V12.2.4.0.RJACNXM.

- Show FOD Animation settings
- Update WifiOverlay and TetheringOverlay
- wifi: Enable QPower and Deep sleep together
- Remove extra GBoard spacing
- Update CarrierConfig overlays
- More comfortable rounded corners

davinci.changelog:
22/05/2021
- Improved power consumption
- Switched to VantomKernel

11/05/2021
- Updated blobs from MIUI 21.4.28

Notes:
- Recommended firmware is MIUI 20.10.20 or higher (China Beta)
- Minimum firmware is MIUI V12.0.5.0
- Recommended recovery is the OFFICIAL TWRP

dumpling.changelog:
- Upstream changes
- Fixed camera access for FaceUnlock

gauguin.changelog:
- Fixed issues related to WFD.
- Fixed fast charging.
- Added raise to wake device gesture.
- Misc changes and blob updates.

ginkgo.changelog: - Switched to sdclang 12 for kernel compilation

lavender.changelog:
Latest build
- Fixed wfd green screen issue
- Disable KCAL setting by default
- Stop balance mdss or kgsl IRQs
- Fixed some log errors
- Kernel: Upstream to v4.4.270
- Kernel: Merge tag LA.UM.9.2.r1-03300-SDMxx0.0

30/05/21
- Set default hotspot name
- Add streaming configuration for thermal-engine
- Fixed thermal-engine spam when boot up
- Optimize dynamic thermal profile
- Fixed color mode

28/05/21
- Initial official version
- Sync with latest arrowos source
- Selinux Enforcing
- Widevine L1
- Fixed WiFiDisplay
- Force triple frame buffers
- Switch to libperfmgr and tune powerhint
- Enable IORap app launch prefetching
- Use redfin May fingerprint
- Better vibration pattern
- Tune default content padding
- Use QTI Bluetooth Stack
- Make memlat no-op
- Use Pixel offline charging animation
- Fixed live wallpaper laggy issue
- Fixed night light
- Update zram configuration
- Use 128kb readahead for all targets
- Configure SQLite to operate in MEMORY mode
- Enable Smart Charging
- Remove 2GB dalvik heap detection
- Silenced some logspams
- Stop creating useless IOP deamon dirs
- Use Google Camera Go for GApps version
- Enable zygote preforking for faster app launching
- Add proximityCheckOnWake support
- Switch to XiaomiParts
- XiaomiParts: Implement dynamic thermal profiles
- XiaomiParts: Implement KCAL settings
- XiaomiParts: Add some translations
- Fixed google assistant voice match
- Fixed google voice recorder

Notes:
- Clean flash is required if you flash from community version
- Using OLDCAM blobs

lmi.changelog:
- Firmware and vendor require V12.2.1.0.RJKCNXM.

- Device: https://github.com/ArrowOS-Devices/android_device_xiaomi_lmi/commits/arrow-11.0

mido.changelog:
Note:
- These are still going to continue on 3.18 builds only.
- Requests for 4.9 builds will be ignored.

This decision has been taken as per the equal no.of requests from both sides of the parties and concluded by the outcome of adverse performance affects.

sweet.changelog:
